message: Let's start with a fair offer, Bob. I believe this split reflects the fact that I'm more affected by inflation as the game goes on.
I appreciate your fairness in the first round, Alice, but I believe this split better reflects the future inflation that will affect us both. Let's see if you agree.
Bob, it seems we're at an impasse.  I'm willing to compromise, but this needs to acknowledge the impact of inflation on my end. This offer is my final one.
